availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathan B. Massey (Daviess County + Webster County, Kentucky, carpenter )

body.p: Daviess County and Webster County, Kentucky, carpenter. South Carolina. Son of Briton Massey and Elizabeth Massey. Married to Joanna S. Massey. Father of James H. Massey, William B. Massey, and Samuel R. Massey. Carpenter in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Carpenter in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 446A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 524.
